description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 11/10/2005

Brooke reveals she did not sleep with Nick, to Eric’s surprise. Eric informs Brooke that Dante has moved in with Bridget. Ridge says that if he works with Stephanie and Taylor, he would hurt Brooke and Eric. Torn, Ridge states that he can’t be apart of the company without Eric. Taylor asks Ridge for his support, but Ridge says he can’t give it. Bridget meets with Nick, Brooke and Eric and demands that they stop playing games with each other. Bridget announces that Nick and Brooke should be together.
